ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: $Profile.Name <> $Label.API_data_Load_Profile && (OR( AND( OR(Account.Id = '0013000000bFuao', Account.Id = '001a000001NJ7ED' ), OR( Subject = '[External] Your order has been shipped', Subject = 'Your order has been shipped' ), OR( RecordTypeId = '01230000000Zen5', RecordTypeId = '01230000000Zen4' ) ), Contact.Primary_Email_Address__c = 'vipts.352mmyp@haf.gr'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cases cannot be created if account name is AJ WALTER AVIATION LTD
